title: USA midfielder Carli Lloyd keen to become an NFL kicker
text:
United States midfielder Carli Lloyd is keen to become an NFL kicker after turning her hand to skill with the Philadelphia Eagles.

Lloyd, who has earned 286 caps for the USA and lifted the World Cup twice, kicked an American football between the posts back in August.

And now the 37-year-old has stated that she would be willing to put on the necessary gear and give kicking in the NFL a go.

USA's Carli Lloyd is keen to become an NFL kicker after trying it with the Philadelphia Eagles

'I want to try it,' she told the Laughter Permitted podcast.

I want to put a helmet on, I want to put pads on, I want to kick with two steps. And then see from there.'

Tottenham striker Harry Kane has previously suggested he would like to give the sport a go as a kicker in '10 or 12 years'.
description: Lloyd, who has earned 286 caps for the USA and lifted the World Cup twice, kicked an American football between the posts back in August. She is willing to give kicking in the NFL a go.
